comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: On the eastern side of George Street, just south of Bathurst Street. Demolished 1983.

comment.author: 86916510@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/63385174@N06] is that where Planet Hollywood now sits?

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content:
Actually the 1948 Council Survey shows that Planet Hollywood (no longer Planet Hollywood and partly used as a Maccas) occupied No 600 George Street further to the right, between Wilmot Street and Central Street, and known in 1948 as the Plaza Theatre. 
The Century Theatre in the picture has been demolished and is now that 1980's abomination on the corner of George and Bathurst Streets.

comment.author: 86916510@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/63385174@N06] It's all an abomination down there!
Very grubby!
